.. _`design_system_components_combobox`:

ComboBox
========

.. figure:: images/component_combobox.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Combobox component that provides a drop-down list of defined data entries for selection. Alternatively users are able to enter own data into the combobox.

The component can be enhanced to allow loading data entries from a specified URL.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.ComboBox.__default__`

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.ComboBoxCatalog.__default__`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_form`
